lead_paragraph: BOWERY--Pamon and ?? Mr. Mrs. White and 'The Miller and his Men, Doors Open at 4. BROADWAY--The Wife and Petticost Government, Poore Open at 7 NIBLO'S.--'Equipment.' Doors open at 7. BURTON'S.--'Markets' and 'Lox and Cox.' Doors open at 7. BROUGHAM'S.--'The Actrees of Padua; Doors Open at 7. CHRISTY'S.--Popular Negro Melodies and Dances. Doors open at 7. BARNUM'S AMERICAN MUSEUM.--Open day and evening.

headline.main: NEW-YORK CITY.; AMUSEMENT AS THIS EVENING.
